title: Cocktail 4.0.3 + Serial  Leopard compatibility, also 10.5.2
description:
Product Description:
Cocktail is an award winning general purpose utility for Mac OS X. It is a smooth and powerful digital toolset with a variety of practical features that simplifies the use of advanced UNIX functions and helps hundreds of thousands of Mac users around the world to get the most out of their computers.

The application serves up a scrumptious mix of maintenance tools and interface tweaks, all accessible via a comprehensive graphical interface. Most of Cocktail\\\&#039;s major features are arranged in five basic categories. In addition, a Pilot lets you clean, repair and optimize your system with one click of the button.
What\\\&#039;s new in this version:

    * Added Mac OS X 10.5.2 compatibility
    * Improved network optimization presets
    * Fixed a bug causing Safari RSS reader to report NSPOSIXErrorDomain:2 error
    * Safari history files in ~/Library/Caches/Metadata/Safari/History directory are now properly cleared
    * Added support for Firefox 3
    * Updated Help files
    * Resolves a number of other issues discovered in the previous release

Operating System Requirements:

This product is designed to run on the following operating systems:

    * Mac OS X 10.5 Intel
    * Mac OS X 10.5 PPC

Additional Requirements:

    * Mac OS X 10.5, or
    * Mac OS X Server 10.5

Download:
